author: minaminao
content:
We are excited to announce Mousse, an Ethereum 2.0 emulator for local testing of applications on Eth2 data sharding, especially Rollups. 
Mousse is designed to be “Ganache for Eth2 data sharding”, and we hope it will be useful for development of Eth2 applications!

Medium → https://ethereum-mousse.medium.com/mousse-an-ethereum-2-0-emulator-for-local-testing-of-eth2-applications-19af727519ce
GitHub → https://github.com/ethereum-mousse/mousse

author: nrryuya
content: I also joined the initial development. Any feedbacks, questions are welcome!
